string.value: If one is to look for a lost memory, then one must return to the place it all started. The place it all startedâ€¦ It all started when you first left Rien and stepped foot on Victoria Island. You'd better go talk to #b#p1201000##k.

You met with #p1201000# for the first time in a while. Lilin seemed genuinely happy to see you work hard to regain your previous form, both physically and mentally. You were glad as she reminisced about the first time you met.
